full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PADMA YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I BSKYED RIM GYI RNAM BSHAD PADMA ZHING GI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @030A *, ,(CES PADMA YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I BSKYED PA'I RIM PA PADMA ZHING GI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI RDO RJE'I SLOB MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN SOGS NANG SLO 'GA' ZHIG GIS, 'DI LTA BU ZHIG NGES PAR DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE SLOB DPON RNAMS LAS CHOS 'DI LA CHOS 'DI'I DBANG BZHI YONGS RDZOGS, BKA' SDOD KYI RIGS BTAD DANG, RTA BOD YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I LUNG MAN NGAG THOB CING, BSNYEN SGRUB SOGS TSAD DU 'KHYOL ZHING, CHOS 'DI LA DAM PA MANG DU BYAS PA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN NAM, 'DI NYID KYI DKYIL 'KHOR DU PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL GYI MING THOB PAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL PA PO NYID DO, ,'DIS KYANG GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG PA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , 'DI LTA BU'I SHIN TU ZAB CING GSANG BA'I CHOS 'DI, DBANG MA THOB CING SNOD MIN SOGS LONGS SPYOD NA, CHOS SKYONG BEG TZE LCAM SRING DANG, BKA' SDOD GING LNGA GZA' GDONG 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA DRAG PO'I LAS KYIS TSAR BCOD CIG , ,,SA MA YA TIshtA, DGE ZHI BKRA SHIS 'BAR BA 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
